messages.content:

new project oracle re update code hi discussed changes code has removed had assigned going allocated after add forecasts code synchronization takes every approved leave her waiting please approve hi please log queue create code per attached form also possible every code requested created two separate tickets raised thank kind regards analyst re update code hi removed thank regards mob friday re update code hi please note leave passing consecutively way flow person has assigned has two codes assigned her where approver approver according flow her approved by then come please let code removed leave needed made order flow thank kind regards analyst re update code hi did reach she logged after st please make requested members regards mob friday re update code hi please specify exactly leave reach investigate problem hi please make code per attached form created thank kind regards analyst thursday pm re update code hello exists cannot completed members logged holiday cannot code yet regards mob thursday pm update code dear further recent communication believe query has resolved resolution response please let further assistance matter reference number summary code resolver resolution notes pm re code hi created allocate members make forecasts after imported employees automatically assigned further assistance please best regards analyst description hello separate budget hence separate code please assist creating code attaching setup form also please make members correspond code st note allocated more than please add code well members kind regards ext ref msg
